item.title: Felix’s DVD Guide to October 31st
item.author: Oliver Calderbank,Matthew Allinson,
item.description: Halloween parties are like sex: either a dark, lusty and twisted extravaganza enhanced by elaborate costumes; or an over-hyped and disappointing charade we do once a year because we feel socially compelled to. Helping you make yours the former, here is our guide of some new and re-released Horror …

item.title: A Swedish social commentary
item.author: Oliver Calderbank,
item.description: When a friend asked me to review a film as a favour, I (as most people would have) said yes. His way of convincing me was “there are two good-looking Swedish girls in”. What my friend didn’t tell me was that the film was rather low budget and had five story lines that didn’t overlap at all. The film …
